plot: A cinematic portrait of the life and career of the infamous American execution device designer and holocaust denier.
title: Mr. Death: The Rise and Fall of Fred A. Leuchter, Jr.
plot_es: A cinematic portrait of the life and career of the infamous American execution device designer and holocaust denier.
original_name: Mr. Death - Grandeur et décadence de Fred A. Leuchter Jr.
plot_en: A cinematic portrait of the life and career of the infamous American execution device designer and holocaust denier.
